entry.title: 3bd2lra7man/SiteBlocker: SiteBlocker is a lightweight, open-source userscript that lets you block access to selected websites or URLs by showing a bold "This site is blocked" message in your browser. Perfect for staying focused, managing distractions, or enforcing parental controls — all configurable on the fly!
entry.content: SiteBlocker is a lightweight, open-source userscript that lets you block access to selected websites or URLs by showing a bold "This site is blocked" message in your browser. Perfect for staying focused, managing distractions, or enforcing parental controls — all configurable on the fly!
